001package com.github.sormuras.bach.workflow;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.DeclaredModules;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectSpace;
007import java.util.List;
008
009public class GrabExternalsWorkflow extends AbstractProjectWorkflow {
010
011  public GrabExternalsWorkflow(Bach bach, Project project) {
012    super(bach, project);
013  }
014
015  public List<String> computeMissingRequiredExternalModules() {
016    var explorer = bach.explorer();
017    return explorer.listMissingExternalModules(
018        project.spaces().values().stream()
019            .map(ProjectSpace::modules)
020            .map(DeclaredModules::toModuleFinder)
021            .toList(),
022        project.externals().requires());
023  }
024
025  @Override
026  public void run() {
027    var missingRequiredExternalModules = computeMissingRequiredExternalModules();
028    if (missingRequiredExternalModules.isEmpty()) return;
029
030    var grabber = bach.grabber(project.externals().locators());
031    grabber.grabExternalModules(missingRequiredExternalModules);
032    grabber.grabMissingExternalModules();
033  }
034}
